availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert E. Duncan (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Lucinda Duncan. Married to Susan Duncan. Father of Endora Duncan, Margaret Duncan, and John Duncan. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 95A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 745.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Charleston, p. 91A.
"Robert E. Duncan (1824-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial #126787594, accessed August 4, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126787594.
